casebody.data:
WILLIAM J. GESSNER, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. EDWARD GUTMAN, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from a judgment, entered in favor of the *564plaintiff on a report of the referee, upon a contract of the parties for work and labor performed and materials furnished, 'for defendant by plaintiff. Cornelius A. Runkle, for appellant. Wm. W. Niles, for respondent. Judgment affirmed.

No opinion delivered.
